flawed_nl_solution:
30 x 2/5 = <<30*2/5=21>>21 members ordered lemon juice.
So, 30 - 21 = <<30-21=9>>9 members did not order lemon juice.
Since 1/3 of the remaining ordered mango juice, then 9 x 1/3 = <<9*1/3=3>>3 members ordered mango juice.
Therefore, 9 - 3 = <<9-3=6>>6 members ordered orange juice.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
